meta.description: sane-epkowa backend for some epson scanners.

license.fullName: Seiko Epson Corporation Software License Agreement for Linux

meta.long_description:
Includes gui-less iscan (aka. Image Scan! for Linux).
Supported hardware: at least :
GT-F720, GT-S620, Perfection V30, Perfection V300 Photo, Perfection V500 Photo
